field.label: Title
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Author
field.hint: Enter the names of the author(s) of this item below.

field.label: Contributors (persons)
field.hint: Enter the names of contributing persons (last name, first name) here and select their role

field.label: Contributors (corporates)
field.hint: Enter the names of contributing corporates here and select their role

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item.

field.label: Abstract (German)
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item in german language below.

field.label: Abstract (English)
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item in english language below.

field.label: TUHH-Institute / Workgroup
field.hint: Choose the institute(s) or the workgroup(s), at that this work has been produced.

form.page:
dc identifier isbn true ISBN onebox If the item has one or more ISBN(s) associated with it, please enter it below.
identifier issn false ISSN onebox dc_relation_ispartof Enter the ISSN of the journal, where this article has been published.
dc relation ispartof false Journal title onebox Enter the name of the journal, in which this item is published
dc publisher
false Publisher onebox Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.
dc relation publication true Related to another tub.dok publication onebox This item is related to another item published on tub.dok
-->
tuhh container issue false Journal Issue onebox Enter the issue of the journal, in that this article has been published.
Article
tuhh container volume false Journal Volume onebox Enter the volume number of the journal, in that this article has been published.
Article
tuhh container startpage false Start page onebox Enter the start page of the article in the original volume.
tuhh container endpage false End page onebox Enter the end page of the article in the original volume.
tuhh relation ispartofseries false Series onebox Enter the series assigned to this item by your community.
tuhh relation ispartofseriesnumber false Series Number onebox Enter the number of the volume in the series assigned to this item by your community.
dc identifier citation false Citation onebox Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.
tuhh publisher
true Publisher's version qualdrop_value Enter the identifier of the publisher's version of this document.
dc date issued false Date of Issue date Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution below. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
dc contributor advisor false Main Advisor name Enter the name of your main thesis advisor (without academic title) here.
Thesis
tuhh contributor referee true Referee name Enter the name of your thesis referee(s) here.
Thesis
thesis grantor universityOrInstitution false Title Granting Institution onebox Enter the name of the title granting institution here.
Thesis
thesis grantor place false Place of title granting institution onebox Enter the residential place of the title granting institution here.
Thesis
dc type thesis false Thesis-Type dropdown Select the generic type of your thesis here. Select the type of thesis you want to submit! Thesis
dcterms dateAccepted
false Date of examination date Enter the date of your oral examination associated with your document. You have to enter the date of your oral examination. If the examinations has not been made yet, you cannot publish your thesis here! Thesis

field.label: Uncontrolled Subject Headings
field.hint: Enter 5-6 subject headings here, that are describing the content of the document (only one subject term per line).

field.label: DDC class
field.hint: Select an appropriate subject class below.
field.required: One DDC class is required as a minimum!

field.label: Areas of Expertise
field.hint: Select the area of expertise of this publication (multiple selection possible).

field.label: Research Focus
field.hint: Select the main research area of this publication (multiple selection possible).

field.label: Supplemented By
field.hint: This item is supplemented by research data. You can provide a persistent identifier (DOI, URN or Handle) by prefixing your input with doi:, urn: or hdl: followed by the identifier without resolver (for example type doi:10.15480/882.1264 here to reference the DOI 10.15480/882.1264). You can also provide any HTTP(S) URI to reference material without a persistent Identifier (NOT recommended).

field.label: Conference
field.hint: Enter the conference name, on that this item was presented

field.label: Access Rights
field.hint: Select the access rights policy appropriate for this publication.
field.required: Please select access rights policy!

field.label: CreativeCommons License
field.hint: If your document is already or shall be under a CreativeCommons License, please select the license here. If you miss your license here, please contact us. If you want to learn more about CC licenses, visit http://creativecommons.org.

field.label: EU Funder
field.hint: For EU-Projects: Please fill out the next three fields.

field.hint: For projects without EU funding

field.hint: Select the resource type of your data file(s).
field.required: The resource type of your data is required.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of publication below. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: Please enter at least the year of your data publication.

field.hint: Information about content, context and reuse of your data.
field.required: Please enter descriptive information.
